column1: quote
Live for today, build for tomorrow
No time to waste, no time to hate
Shine on
Stay unproblematic, age flawless
Zen as fuck
Everything you put in will be multiplied
Go your own way
Petty is never pretty
Your opportunities are endless
Energy is precious, don't spend it defending lies
Why correct others? Karma will do it better
Your dreams are about to come true
Believe in the good
Ignore the bullshit
Baby girl, you are 💯
Always take the high road, the views are better
If it feels shady, let go without regret
It will all make sense in the end. If it doesn't, it's not the end
Trust your gut
Work on yourself daily
Stay curious
Don't let one bad apple ruin the bunch
Miscalculations refine your trajectory
The truth always comes to light
Bitterness corrodes, acceptance glows
Your passions look like a billion dollars
Unhappy people fear what's beyond them, happy people reach for the unknown
Practice your morals everyday
Pick yourself up, lift others high, praise your enemies, spread goodwill
At the end of the day, wash yourself clean
Start each day with joy in your eyes
Find peace in the little moments
Remember who you are
Never apologize for loving fiercely
Do things for the right reasons only
Forward movement only
Patience will reward you beyond your imagination
Take care of the vulnerable
Teach those younger than you about hope
Teach those older than you about selflessness
Teach yourself about why good people do hurtful things
Let go with consideration
If it's painful, it was worth it
Laugh freely
You can find humor in any situation
Look! This is a sign that you're on the right track
Yes, you can
